welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dana Point, where the sun, sand, and surf await you! Discover the charm of our coastal city and indulge in all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights operated by Frontier Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest Airlines, and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights operated by Air Canada, Allegiant Air, and Sun Country Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers may access the airport's free WiFi by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
